name: File Operations
description: Read, write, and list files and directories on the host system.

functions.name: read
functions.description: Read the contents of a file.

path.description: Absolute or relative path to the file.

maxLines.description: Maximum number of lines to read. Reads entire file if not specified.

functions.name: write
functions.description: Write content to a file. Creates the file if it does not exist. Creates parent directories as needed.

path.description: Absolute or relative path to the file.

content.description: Content to write to the file.

append.description: If true, append to the file instead of overwriting. Defaults to false.

functions.name: list
functions.description: List the contents of a directory.

path.description: Absolute or relative path to the directory.
